attributes.additional_details:
The UK is our sanctuary and if you wish to stay here do not threaten or cause harm to anyone because of your beliefs.

Mr Cameron please put this in your agenda  and the public must vote on this.  Do not give any special treatment to anyone who cause harmful things to others in the UK.

This must also go to the European Courts of Justice to pass as law in all UK .  Our fight against terrorism and hopefully for a more peaceful world starts here with a campaign.
